pics.desc: Hiking in Zhaoqing with Mitchell and Jeana during our summer trip to SE Asia.
Making friends through BJJ in Ho Chi Minh City, at Kimura BJJ.
When the Hopkins BJJ club got our own rashguards.
My first group outing with Marks group. Mark couldn't make it because of an emergency.

Mark and Zach doubleteaming a poster session at EMNLP 2018.
Some of Mark's group at EMNLP 2018 standing in front of Manneken Piss.
Sebastian pondering the futility of Big Honking Neural Language Models.
One of my first pictures of JHU.
Austin to Baltimore with what I could fit in my car.
